title: It's just something kids do (TEFC)
creator_credit: La Trobe University Media Centre and Patricia Edgar
brief_description: Studies the effects of urbanisation on children’s play. Looks at the growth of adventure playgrounds and explains how they fall short of their counterparts in European countries. Furthermore, they are not a substitute for the natural environment.
creator_credit_for_label: La Trobe University Media Centre and Patricia Edgar
